docs.lead_paragraph: David Klein is a 14-year-old boy who lives in the Coney Island section of Brooklyn. What's different about David from the thousands of other teen-agers in Brooklyn? A great deal.

headline.main: Muscular Dystrophy; Disabling Disease Still Resists Efforts To Discover Both Its Cause and Cure

docs.abstract: Dr Rusk article on typical case and complex research to discover cause and cure; orgns working on research noted
